Our Mission : A private piano studio that aims to provide a holistic and individualised piano and keyboard lessons for all students in a friendly and well equipped environment with fully accredited piano teachers.

Our mission is to simply provide a holistic and individualized piano and keyboard lessons in a friendly and well equipped environment. We conduct individual/group lessons for all ages and experience levels.  JMS is staffed only by full-time professional piano teachers. Come and join us for interesting and creative piano/music lessons.  
Location : Centrally located at 502 Ang Mio Kio Ave 5. Only 2 km from The French & Australian International schools,  withineasy reach of Singapore American School, Toa Payoh, Braddell, Bishan, Upper Thomson, Yishun, Yio Chu Kang, Hougang, Sengkang, Serangoon North, Serangoon Gardens, Li Hwan or Lorong Ah Soo. Thank you for being such a blessing...for being so tolerant...thank you for believing in me when I was about to give up....for pushing me when I thought I could go no further. Above all, thank you for being my teacher! You are truly a wonderful piano teacher! Happy Teachers' Day!!   . . .. . .. . .. . .  Andrew Ng 
Dear Ms Lo, 
We wish to express our heartfelt gratitude and thanks for your teaching, care and guidance you had given our daughters for the past 9 years. With your encouragement she has grown from an introvert child into a confident and musically creative teenager. My hushand, Peter and I would like to say A BIG THANK YOU for all the wonderful things you had done for Li Lian. . ...  Peter & Wee Lee Koh

Thanks for your feedback.Your advice is noted. We will ensure Amanda spends more time to practise piano pieces. For your information, she was applauded and commended for her fine impromptu performance during the holiday with a chance to demonstrate her piano skill in a birthday banquet held for her grandparents in Shanghai. Many guests asked how and where we could find such a good piano teacher." Regards. . ... LK - Jan                                                    
Dear Ms Lo, 
Season Greetings.Just  like to thank you for your effort in enhancing learning and creativity in your lessons. We believe that the change will definitely go a long way in enabling our girls to be more aware of their potentials. We appreciate your varied teaching methods that is aimed to enrich their learning experience. . .. . .  Mrs June Wong 
Dear Ms Lo, 
Thank you for coaching our son, Aidon. We have seen him gained much confidence while playing on his keyboard. Besides, he no longer finds practicing a chore but enjoys doing it to refine his skills. In the past, we used to see him getting frustrated whenever he's unsure about the pieces he's handling. Yet as parents, we are not able to coach him much as we do not have prior piano experience. We are relieved to see that Aidan is guided closely by you so much so that whenever he's home practicing, he knows exactly what to do, We are very blessed and grateful that Aidan has such a patient and motivating piano teacher like you. We look forword to Aidan taking his Grade 1 piano exam under your professional guidance. Thank again. Regards. . .. . .. . .. . .. . ...Geraldine, 7th Aug 2012

Are you in place  in which you've enrolled in a GMAT prep class but nonetheless feel less than prepared for your exam? I can help. Unlike your GMAT prep course, I provide: 
 
- customized tutoring sessions tailored around your requirements, rather than around the needs of an entire class. 
 
- My own GMAT curriculum that contains more than 2,500 practice GMAT math questions. This program enables us to study each topic at length, not only during every lesson but also  for homework enabling you to move forward in between lessons. 
 
- Access to meet for a session at whatever time is most convenient for you. If you want to meet in the morning I'll be able to meet. However, if you want to meet on the weekends , I am also able to meet. 
 
- Experience as a GMAT coach. I have been tutoring the GMAT full-time for over a decade. Over that time  I have tutored over 10,000 hours for the GMAT. You will get the chance to be taught by a legitimate GMAT professional. 
 
Please reach out to me today, so we can talk further and schedule a free session.

Did you recently walk out of the GMAT in surprise because your score was nowhere close to your target? Were you amazed by the difficulty of the exam? You are not alone. For the past eight years I have been coaching students in  your exact situation. Just like you, they did not know what to expect on their GMAT and found that their planning was absolutely inadequate. Whether it was a class that didn't teach with enough detail, a tutor who didn't give them 100% commitment, or a self-study course that simply didn't help, these students had to take the GMAT an additional time. 
 
Like those same students, you should not quit! And like those students, you've found the right teacher that will help you defeat the GMAT once and for all. 
 
I understand the GMAT better than most people in the world. I have taken it numerous times and have been a GMAT coach for the better part of the last decade. Over that period I've  numerous students and helped them attain what they assumed was impossible....a high GMAT score. 
 
Like you, I was once a GMAT student without a extensive quantitative background. Nevertheless, with hard work and commitment I was able to attain GMAT mastery. I understand that math is burdensome for most students, which is why I am an excellent teacher -  because above all else I can teach you the GMAT in the same manner that I once taught myself. 
 
Follow up with me today so we can chat about a personalized plan for you.
title: Professional GMAT Teaching -- Promised To Produce Results!

2) How do I teach?  
 
What I do best is that I can lead lessons to what you need whether it's a daily conversation or business Korean or TOPIK. I prefer conversational approach and use books, picture cards , vocabulary quizzes , TV news , and K-POP lyrics depending on your level and interests. Currently, I have Korean learning blog/ Facebook page where you can learn Korean through K-POP lyrics.

4) How many students do I have? 
 
I have 10 students in total.Their occupations are various such as English teachers, office workers, a lawyer , a paramedic , etc.
